hero.title: Malawus kayu king BetterGov.ph
hero.subtitle: Ini ing portal ning Republika ning Pilipinas, na tatalakaran da reng boluntaryu. Mantun kang impormasyun, lungub ka kareng serbisyung pang-gobyernu, at manatiling makibalu keng pekabayung balita keng Pilipinas

services.title: Deng Sikat a Serbisyu
services.description: Magamit mo reng opisial a serbisiu ning kapamahalan a malagua at malaguang-lagua. Maintun mu ing kailangan mu para king pagkasiudadanu, negosiu, pamagaral, at aliwa pa.

footer.copyright: ¬© 2025 BetterGov. Ing eganaganang laman at impormasyun ay parti ning publiku maliban mu nung ali ya makasulat.

navbar.flood control projects: Deng Proyektu king Pagkontrol ning Baha

joinUs.stripSubtitle: Saup ya magtikdo king malaus a Pilipinas ampo ing pamuntuk kapamilatan ning teknolohiya
joinUs.bannerSubtitle: Saup ya magtikdo king malaus a Pilipinas ampo ing pamuntuk kapamilatan ning teknolohiya.

data.title: Real-Time Data Services
data.description: Makakua ka keng pekabalyu a impormasyon tungkul king kalagayan ning panaun at deng rate ning foreign exchange king keraklan Pilipinas.
data.weatherDescription: Kunin ing kasalungsungan kalagayan ning panaun ampo reng taya para kareng pangunahing lakanbalen king keraklan Pilipinas. Planun yu ing aldaw yu gamit reng tumpak a pagbasa ning temperatura ampo reng pasiguru king panaun.
data.forexDescription: Bantayan mo reng rate ning foreign exchange ibat king Bangko Sentral ng Pilipinas (BSP). Mag-convert kareng currencies at lon mo reng historical rate trends para kareng pangunahing world currencies.

promotion.philsysDescription: Magpatala na keni king kekayung Philippine Identification System (PhilSys) ID card ngeni. Ing national ID magsilbi yang metung mung ID a miyebili ning kapamahalan para kareng egana-ganang lungsuranun.

government.title: Kapamahalan ning Pilipinas
government.description: Abalu nyu ing tungkul kareng atlung sangay ning kapamahalan ning Pilipinas at nanu ing pamag-ugnayan da bang magsilbi kareng tau.
government.executiveDescription: Panibalan ning Pamuntuk, dapat manuparan at payatutupad kareng batas.
government.legislativeDescription: Bibilugan ning Senadu at Kamara ding Representanti, dapat gawang batas.
government.judiciaryDescription: Panibalan ning Korte Suprema, dapat manintindi kareng batas at magsilbi king katarungan.
government.directoryDescription: Paintunan ing impormasiun king pamakiugnayan para kareng opisial ning kapamahalan, deng ahensya, ampong opisina king pambansa ampong lokal a lebel.
